title: No wonder this game is slowly dying over Fortnite, good riddance ;)
body:
Played few ranked games, y'know, the usual stuff. Won few games, niice-niice but hey, you feel like trying to actually play ranked for what it is and actually try to improve your skills and rank? Let's start throwing sh1t like that at your face
https://imgur.com/a/hRt4V[IMG]
Let's see how will you do for the next 10 games when every game is like this :) Yeaaaaa i don't think so...But at least the we love the new skins and champions over the actual fixing of the matchmaking system that has been broken for years, right? RIGHT?

Edit: Had another game, this time was the other way around, we smashed enemy so hard they started flaming eachother on 15th minute....

Edit2: Here is another "balanced solo carry winnable game"
https://imgur.com/a/osrK8[IMG]
Should i change my account region or something for this to stop happening?
Edit3:
https://imgur.com/a/l1JSI[IMG]
Still keeps happening rofl, when is it gonna stop?
